|blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1267483 |website = http://www.cityofmontrosesd.com/ |footnotes = |pop_est_footnotes = }} Montrose is a city in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in McCook County, and 468 people lived there at the 2020 census. Montrose became a city in 1880. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Montrose website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1880 establishments in Dakota Territory
